setup_instructions.step_3: Create an App ID for your app (e.g., com.genzapp.translator)
setup_instructions.step_5: Create a Service ID for Sign In with Apple
setup_instructions.step_6: Generate a private key for Sign In with Apple
setup_instructions.step_7: Copy the Team ID, Key ID, and private key
setup_instructions.step_8: Update the cognito_stack.py file with your values

required_values.team_id: Found in Apple Developer Console > Membership
required_values.key_id: Found when you create the private key
required_values.private_key: The private key file content (PEM format)
